sense.name: weapon, armament, firearm (metaphoric also)
sense.examples: In many states it is illegal to carry a concealed gun. The battleship aimed its 16-inch guns at the approaching enemy ship. The marines gave him a 21 gun salute. The law firm has decided to bring in its big guns on that case.

sense.name: person who is employed to use a gun
sense.examples: He's a fast gun with a 22-caliber pistol. The drug lord always had a couple of hired guns at his side.

sense.name: hand-operated pump
sense.examples: Use a glue gun to glue those paper lanterns together. They have several grease guns in their repair shop.

sense.name: accelerator pedal (British?)
sense.examples: He hit the gun and the car squealed tires as he roared off.
